title: Lucia And The Loom ~Weaving Her Way To Happiness~
alternative_title: 服飾師ルチアはあきらめない ; 服飾師ルチアはあきらめない ～今日から始める幸服計画～ ; Fukushokushi Lucia wa Akiramenai: Kyou kara Hajimeru Koufuku Keikaku ; Fukushokushi Lucia wa Akiramenai ;Fukushokushi Lucia wa Akiramenai - Kyou kara Hajimeru Koufuku Keikaku
status: 服飾師ルチアはあきらめない ; 服飾師ルチアはあきらめない ～今日から始める幸服計画～ ; Fukushokushi Lucia wa Akiramenai: Kyou kara Hajimeru Koufuku Keikaku ; Fukushokushi Lucia wa Akiramenai ;Fukushokushi Lucia wa Akiramenai - Kyou kara Hajimeru Koufuku Keikaku
description:
Description :
        Lucia thought she couldn't be cute because of her plain appearance.  However, in the wake of her encounter during her childhood, she decides that she will continue to love what she loves.  As she grows up, Lucia continues to make her clothes, dreaming of having her own workshop someday. She is appointed as the head of the clothing magic workshop. The embarrassment and troubles due to the big selection are nothing if it's for the realization of the dream!  In addition to her work, Lucia solves the problems of people who visit her clothing guild.  In order to fill the royal capital with her wonderful clothes someday, her dressmaker Lucia's happy clothes plan begins here!
